examples: The gymnast effortlessly bent her body into a graceful arch during her routine.
Under stress, the body produces adrenalin.
The doctor examined her body to check for any signs of illness or injury.
The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
He dedicated himself body and soul to the education of young men.
words.defineEn: our or an animal's hands, legs, head, and every other part together
words.defineVi: tay, chân, đầu và mọi bộ phận khác của chúng ta hoặc động vật cùng với nhau

examples: The Canadian team handed the game to them on a silver plate.
The girl held her father's hand tightly.
She handed me a clean plate for dessert.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The prisoner held his head in his hands.
words.defineEn: the part of our body that is at the end of our arm and we use to grab, move, or feel things
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể nằm ở cuối cánh tay và chúng ta dùng để nắm lấy, di chuyển hoặc cảm nhận đồ vật

examples: Fingers crossed!
A successful investor has his finger on the pulse of international business.
she has her fingers in a lot of pies.
She ran her fingers nervously through her hair.
The musician's fingers lightly touched the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
words.defineEn: each of the long thin parts that are connected to our hands, sometimes the thumb is not included
words.defineVi: mỗi phần dài mỏng được nối với bàn tay của chúng tôi, đôi khi không bao gồm ngón tay cái

examples: Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
His arms dropped limply to his sides.
He moved his arm away from his face.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
The proud uncle held his newborn nephew in his arms.
words.defineEn: one of the two body parts that is connected to the shoulder and ends with fingers
words.defineVi: một trong hai bộ phận cơ thể được nối với vai và kết thúc bằng ngón tay

examples: His parents footed the bill for his college education.
Not working my foot.
My father always had a lead foot.
Who will be footing the bill for the party?
I dipped my feet in the cool water of the river.
words.defineEn: the body part that is at the end of our leg and we stand and walk on
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể ở cuối chân của chúng ta và chúng ta đứng và đi

examples: The business has legs.
The street vendor served flavorful turkey legs.
At a lively seafood restaurant, guests relished succulent crab legs.
She lost a leg in a car crash.
College tuitions cost an arm and leg nowadays.
words.defineEn: each of the two long body parts that we use when we walk
words.defineVi: mỗi trong số hai bộ phận cơ thể dài mà chúng ta sử dụng khi đi bộ

examples: The company was on its knees.
She's the bee's knees.
I must have hit my knee.
The weight of the world pushed him to his knees.
He performed knee exercises to strengthen the muscles around the joint.
words.defineEn: the body part that is in the middle of the leg and helps it bend
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể ở giữa chân và giúp nó uốn cong

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
Dr. Jaffe pinned her ears back.
Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
I ran the tape back.
The enemy was driven back.
words.defineEn: the part of our body between our neck and our legs that we cannot see
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể giữa cổ và chân mà chúng ta không thể nhìn thấy

examples: Our hearts go out to the families of the victims of this terrible tragedy.
They never lost heart, even in the face of adversity.
They pour out their hearts to God.
Please, open your hearts to these poor people.
And now the poor thing is crying his heart out.
words.defineEn: the body part that pushes the blood to go to all parts of our body
words.defineVi: bộ phận cơ thể đẩy máu đi đến tất cả các bộ phận của cơ thể chúng ta

examples: The new soldiers had no stomach for a fight.
You must have a cast-iron stomach.
She felt a wave of nausea in her stomach during the car ride.
Do you get butterflies in your stomach when you have to talk to lots of people?
You must have a cast-iron stomach if you're eating pickles with peanut butter!
words.defineEn: the body part inside our body where the food that we eat goes
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể bên trong cơ thể chúng ta, nơi thức ăn chúng ta ăn đi
